game.name: Call of Duty®: Modern Warfare® 3 (2011)
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Valve Anti-Cheat enabled, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 공전의 베스트셀링 1인칭 액션 시리즈가 다수의 올해의 게임 상을 수상한 Call of Duty®: Modern Warfare® 2의 거대한 후속작으로 돌아옵니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The best-selling first-person action series of all-time returns with an epic sequel to the multiple GOTY award winner Call of Duty®: Modern Warfare® 2

reviewHighlights.text: Rest in peace, Vince Zampella (1970 - 2025). Left this world too soon. Even if you weren't involved in this game, it was still your series. Countless...
the game is fun but doesnt have controller support
